name: swarm

effect.scarlet-violet: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.the-teal-mask: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
